body.p: ∏ provides a rich set of add-on frameworks for network and web application development.
Use the AppeX framework and tools to build web applications that combine server-side Smalltalk with client-side Javascript, and SiouX to build scalable, high-performance web servers.

The Net Clients framework enables your application to work with standard internet services such as FTP, HTTP, and e-mail, while the Web Services framework provides a full implementation of WSDL and SOAP. The Security framework provides components to enable transport layer security and widely-used cryptographic algorithms.
Finally, you can build distributed applications using the Opentalk and DST frameworks.
